remarks: Version of ~ sbcom2 with a context, and distinct variable conditions replaced with distinctors.  (Contributed by Wolf Lammen, 4-Aug-2019.)
statement:
wl-sbcom2d.1 $e |- ( ph -> -. A. x x = w ) $.
wl-sbcom2d.2 $e |- ( ph -> -. A. x x = z ) $.
wl-sbcom2d.3 $e |- ( ph -> -. A. z z = y ) $.
wl-sbcom2d $p |- ( ph -> ( [ w / z ] [ y / x ] ps <-> [ y / x ] [ w / z ] ps ) ) $.
